title: Silver Plan
description: Quick, targeted consultation to address immediate concerns.
features: Focused guidance on specific mental health issues

title: Gold Plan (Most Popular)
description: A comprehensive session to explore challenges and find clarity for long-term solutions.
features: Deep dive into mental health challenges, including OCD and intrusive thoughts

title: Platinum Plan
description: Extensive, holistic support for sustainable growth and emotional transformation.
features: 6 hours of comprehensive Skype consultation with Mehran
Holistic approach to mental health recovery and personal growth
Exclusive resources tailored to your emotional and psychological needs

Ongoing support with flexible session breakdown
